titles.title: Terminal Disability Fairness and Equity Act of 1999

To amend title II of the Social Security Act to waive the waiting period otherwise required for diability beneficiaries in the case of individuals suffering from terminal illnesses with not more than six months to live.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/11/1999--Introduced. Terminal Disability Fairness and Equity Act of 1999 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to waive the waiting period otherwise required for social security disability beneficiaries suffering from a medically determined terminal illness with not more than six months to live.
